word: Selfishness destroys the moral image of God in man, filling him with self-love. . . .Christ says, "Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect" (Matthew 5:48). But self-love is blind to the perfection which God requires. . . . Seeking the good of others is the only way to find true happiness.--Manuscript 78, 1901, pp. 6, 10. ("Camp-ground, Oakland," June 8 or 15, 1901.)
